TopicTitle: Luna Multiplayer Comm Network and Revert to Launch/Vab not working

Articles.Content:
so i set up a normal Luna Multiplayer Server on my PC, i turned revert and Comm Network on but both aren´t working, when i press ESC with a Craft there is no Option to revert and the Comm Network is Comepletely turned off HELP!

 

Thanks for you´re help,

 

Marvin Letsche.
